channel.title: [508 BULBY] Changing what NPC's say?
channel.description:
Hey guys! I'm using a 508 Bulby source, but I'm having trouble. Where do I edit what NPC's yell out/vent?
What file? And what folder/directory?
Thanks:3
EDIT: DON'T BOTHER TO REPLY, I FIGURED IT OUT!
